_comment: DCS World Dedicated Server (Docker-based, fork of Aterfax) with selectable version
name: DCS Dedicated Server (Docker)
author: David
description: Runs the DCS World Dedicated Server using a custom Docker image built for Pterodactyl. You can select the version/tag of the image to run.

installation.script: echo 'This egg uses a prebuilt Docker image. Nothing to install here.'

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: Port the DCS server will run on.

variables.name: Docker Image Version
variables.description: Select which version/tag of the DCS Docker image to use.
